transcript:
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Namaskar sir, Aditya baat kar raha hu IndiaMART se.
Customer: Ji bataiye Aditya ji.
Executive: Bahar hai kya sir aap?
Customer: Nahi bahar bataiye.
Executive: Accha lag raha hai bike ki aawaz aa rahi hai isliye puch raha hu.
Customer: Ji woh mai sir abhi baat karta hu.
Executive: Ji haan.
Customer: Sir aap bike, aap bike chala rahe hai, bike chala lijiye fir baat karte hai.
Customer: Bas pahunch gaye, pahunch gaye.
Executive: Accha accha, kar lijiye, theek hai, shukriya.
Executive: Asal mein phone kiya tha sir aapne kal call kiya tha setting pe.
Customer: Ji kiya tha ji.
Executive: Haan ji sir, isi ke regarding call kiya tha sir hume pata chala ki sir hamara offer tha.
Executive: Ji ji, toh hamare paas aaya in call, isi ke regarding sir aapne call kiya tha sir?
Customer: Sir maine apna refund wapas ke according call kiya tha.
Customer: Kyuki mujhe kuch business provide ho nahi pa raha hai.
Customer: Aap se bhi kai baar baat hui hai isi ke usme.
Customer: Hmm hmm.
Customer: Toh isiliye call, call kiya tha maine.
Executive: Ji toh aapne bola tha na aap Uttar Pradesh mein deal karenge toh waha ki toh by-lead nikaali thi na sir sahi sahi.
Customer: Sir pichle mein sab sab kar liya hai sir kuch kahi se response nahi aaya.
Executive: Sir aap agar teen din mein se 11 din aap active rahenge sir toh response toh thoda kam rahega na sir.
Customer: Kaha 11 din, matlab do-do mahine tak permanent us pe active rahe hai toh jab bhi nahi aaya fir ab aur ek mahine aapke kehne se main active aur reh chuka hu, fir bhi nahi aaya fir toh bataiye Aditya ji wohi hai, kisi ko agar agar kisi kaam se agar kaam aaye jaise matlab ki toh usse insan band toh karna nahi chahega na.
Customer: Hmm hmm.
Customer: Ha jab us us cheez se bilkul koi bhi is prakar ka response hi nahi aa raha hai toh uske liye kya hi kar sakte hai fir toh use matlab ki close hi karna padega.
Executive: Toh sir ye jo close wala aap keh rahe hai sir toh aap aapne jab use karna start kiya tha mai batau na sir by-lead jo aap bol rahe hai consume mai kar raha hu, mai seedha by-lead pe baat, matlab by-lead ki baat kar raha hu jo consume aap kar rahe hai sir, lekin sir aap ek ek din purani bhi by-lead consume kar rahe hai sir.
Executive: Aisa kyu sir?
Customer: Ek ek din purani by-lead pura.
Executive: Haan haan, iske kya hai ki hum us area ki by-lead bhi dekho uthate hai taki yaha pe koi prakar ki dikkat na ho.
Executive: Theek hai, Badohi Uttar Pradesh yaha pe aap deal karte hai?
Customer: Kaha se?
Executive: Badohi Uttar Pradesh yaha pe aap deal karte hai?
Customer: Ji karte hai idhar.
Executive: Sir isme sir kya aa raha hai ki mere ko har jagah kyu utha ke Aditya ji har jagah kyu utha ke by-lead dekh li magar kahi se koi bhi prakar ka response nahi aaya, isiliye maine us pe usi number pe call kiya tha 9696 pe.
Executive: Ji.
Customer: Hmm hmm, maine unko bhi bataya apni sari samasya hai, maine ki aise aise samasya hai, agar hume is cheez se kaam mil mil raha hota toh hum refund wapas ke liye kyu call karte bataiye.
Customer: Hmm hmm, sahi hai.
Customer: Haan ya toh fir agar hum is is cheez se pehle se interest na hote toh hum kyu matlab ki ab isme apna paisa fasate, pehle toh interest tha mujhe isme ki kaam aayega is cheez se jab isse kaam hi nahi aa raha toh fir kya hi karenge bataiye aap.
Customer: Jaise hi ek mahina hua tha waise hi mai pehle kaun si dusri koi thi.
Executive: Manager.
Customer: Haan, kya naam tha unka naam nahi yaad aa raha, fir uske baad mein aap aaye unse bhi maine yahi shikayat ki thi ki mam kaam nahi aa pa raha hai mahina hua tha lekin kaam toh unhone kaha ki aayega abhi samay lagega.
Customer: Unki koi baat nahi jab tak aap change ho gaye.
Customer: Fir aapko yahi baat boli maine ki kaam nahi aa raha hai toh bataiye teen mahine ho gaye mujhe IndiaMART se ek bhi order nahi mila hai.
Executive: Sir dekhiye aap jo keh rahe hai na abhi baat galat nahi hai, teen mahina maine use kiya hai, maine aapki seedhe sari baat suni hai, mai ek baar bhi kuch bol nahi raha tha, aapki maine sari baatein suni hai, lekin aap meri ek baat bataiye apna jo jaise promotion hota hai, theek hai, promotion hone mein time lagta hai, sir agar aap agar pure saal ka hota hai sir, ek din ka toh hota nahi apna, pure saal ka hota hai.
Customer: Ji.
Executive: Mai keh raha hu pure pure saal ka apna business kya hai, teen mahine mein toh business ki services bhi nahi thi, aapne pure saal ki services li thi na, toh teen mahine use karke aap aise kaise decide kar pa rahe hai sir ki aapko business nahi aa raha hai.
Customer: Business nahi aa raha hai jab bhi toh fir keh rahe hai ki agar agar hum dekho Aditya ji hume agar teen mahine mein teen mahine mein che order bhi mil jate na fir bhi hum ye kehte ki hum ise matlab ki already chalayenge karenge kaam is pe.
Customer: Hmm hmm.
Customer: Haan, abhi abhi aap keh rahe hai ki aapko ek bhi order nahi mila hai.
Customer: Ek bhi order nahi aaya bataiye kya kar sakte hai ab is pe.
Executive: Dekhiye ek second sir, mai aapke area ko open kar leta hu jis area mein hum deal karte hai, aapke area mein sir ek Ram Murti agency karke hai woh bhi isme isme deal karte hai jisme hum deal karte hai, theek hai, andar jo frames mein, kya naam hai unka?
Executive: Kanpur ke unka kya hai Ram Murti, Ram Murti agency.
Customer: Accha.
Executive: Kya woh sir jaante hai aap?
Customer: Nahi nahi jaante.
Executive: Ek minute mai bata raha hu Kanpur ke bande hai, IndiaMART ki services use kar rahe hai woh bhi, unko bhi inquiries in calls iski girti hai, woh bhi ekdam high not access range mein bhi hai jaise hamare kuch, jaise kya hota hai ki yaha pe mai jo bata raha hu aapke area se jo log hai jo yaha pe access rehte hai toh unko sir jo access rehte hai unko business milti hai sir aisa nahi hai ki business bilkul hi nahi milti, theek hai aap mujhe se keh rahe ho ki mere ko nahi mil rahi, sir mai ek cheez recommend recommend kya karunga, dekhiye baar baar wohi cheez recommend karunga aap baar baar wohi cheez kar rahe hai fir aapko refund hone wali, sir ek baat bataiye aap refund wali baat hui nahi hai matlab kahi pe ki aapko refund ho jayega ya fir aisa kuch.
Customer: Kyu nahi sir hui thi baat sari baat hui thi ye.
Customer: Join hone se pehle hi mai toh pehle yahi keh raha tha ki pura saal ka na karke mera pehle do mahine ka kar do agar isse is cheez se kaam aayega na hume toh hum aage aur bhi badha sakte hai.
Customer: Yahi bol raha tha maine.
Executive: Ji.
Customer: Aur maine starting mein hi yahi bola tha.
Customer: Toh theek hai ki aap ek saal ka kar lo agar nahi aa raha hai na toh us saale se mai phone lagata hu woh saala mera phone hi nahi receive karta hai.
Executive: Kyuki sir jaha tak hamara ye policy hai isme refund ka koi aisa policy hai nahi, theek hai, refund ho jaye ya fir aisi cheez hai, jo baat hai na aapko direct bata raha hu, agar fir uske baad agar unhone bola hai toh aapke paas kahi written mein ye cheez hai sir?
Customer: Ji sir maangta tha.
Executive: Ji?
Executive: Dekhiye aapne aap aap se unhone bola hai ki sir mai aapki baat samajh raha hu lekin aap mujhe ye bataiye jo cheez aap bol rahe hai refund wala agar kahi pe aapke paas aisa likha hua hai sir?
Customer: Unhone kuch written mein nahi diya.
Customer: Kya bolte hai na bharose vishwas pe hi kar liya maine us pe matlab agar vishwas na hota toh hum kyu 35-35 hazar rupaye fasa dete is pe, is cheez pe interest tha ki chalo haan aayega toh dekha jayega aayega kaam agar mere 35 hazar gaye hai toh 35 ki bajaye na hume lakh kama ke de 35 mere 35 35 toh kamwa de hum ye saal mein jitne mere lage hue hai.
Executive: Theek hai.
Executive: Aap ye keh rahe hai ki pure saal mein 35 toh kamwa dete, sir 35 ke liye saal toh use toh karo sir, abhi dekho dekho mai mai nahi bol raha aapko teen mahine.
Customer: Ab kya hai maine aap Aditya ji wohi baat kar rahe ho jab teen mahine mein nahi kuch aaya toh saal aur aur baki ke nau mahine mein kya hi aa jayega.
Customer: Starting mein jab kaam aata hai na toh insan meri baat toh suno jab starting mein koi cheez mein kaam aata hai na toh aadmi interest dikhata hai us cheez pe ki haan chalo abhi abhi se isme kaam aa raha hai jab teen mahine ho gaye kaam kuch kaam nahi aaya hai toh aage aage interest is cheez se kam hi toh hoga mera.
Customer: Batao accha agar jitna time matlab ki isme denge na utna kahi field pe visit kar lenge isse jyada kaam aa sakta hai.
Executive: Toh sir pura din aapko mai thoda keh raha hu aap IndiaMART pe pura time dene ki zarurat hai, aap jaise agar apne din ka 15 se 20 minute bhi de rahe ho woh bhi very good hai sir, pura time aap mobile pe use karte hai na sir?
Customer: Phone pe hi use karte hai laptop pe use karne ka samay hi nahi hai sir.
Executive: Wohi toh sir mobile pe aap use kar rahe hai toh mobile pe kaun mil raha hai aapko pura time aap baithe hue hai ya fir woh cheez toh aap kahi visit pe gaye sir, is baat pe thodi der ke liye aap baithe toh us time pe aap use kar lo is tarike se use kariye na sir.
Executive: Mai aapke chaliye theek hai theek hai.
Executive: Mai, maine, maine aapka dekh rakha hai ki apna jo jitne bhi humne by-lead use ki hai woh kaun se time duration pe hai, aap chahe toh mai aapko bata bhi bata bhi sakta hu, duration wohi hai last ki aapki ek mahine ki, theek hai ki matlab hum kaun se by-lead consume kar rahe hai toh aap pichle mahine, sorry hafte ka dekh leta hu mai kuch, agar isi hafte is mahine ka hi dekhe November ka hi dekhe toh 35% aisi by-lead hai jo aap ek din purani aap by-lead use kar rahe hai, 35% pichle mahine ka bata raha hu 35% aisi by-lead thi jo aap pichle ek din purani use kar rahe hai, sir ek din purani agar koi by-lead aap use karenge waha business nahi aata hai.
Executive: Aur dekhiye sir mai ye nahi keh raha ki sari ki sari jitni bhi by-lead aap use kar rahe ho sabse business aayega, by-lead se business aana aur for sure inquiries se business aana isme antar hota hai, for sure inquiries se aapko business aane ke chances jyada rehte hai.
Executive: Toh waha pe jo inquiries aati hai waha pe aap call kiya kariye, unko jaise kya kariye jaise mai aur aap hi baithe hue hai agar mai aapko baat baat na karke aapko call karta, theek hai, are sorry call na karke aapko message karta ki sir dekho ye dikkat hai isko aise aise karke aapko solve karna hai, woh cheeze toh already already aap dekh rahe ho already aap kar rahe ho, toh baat sunne ka alag impact padta hai na sir toh aap baat karoge toh mai kahunga inquiries pe aap baat kariye, by-lead jo hai by-lead try kijiye ki jo thoda pehle ka rahe matlab ek din ke andar andar wali by-lead rahe woh by-lead aap consume kariye sir, theek hai.
Executive: Aur rahi baat dekhiye rahi baat apna pura time jaise aap din se keh rahe hai char ghanta paanch ghanta IndiaMART ko de rahe hai itna time sir nahi dena chahiye, aap itna time mat dijiye, ab apne business pe dhyan dijiye matlab aur aap keh rahe ho na ki 35 hazar aapne pura saal ka diya hai, sir teen mahine mein agar aap keh rahe ho ki mere ko business nahi mila pure saal nahi milega aisa nahi hota sir market up down hota hai, aisa toh hai nahi sir ki normal sa hai ki matlab ek din ek din mein humne do din use kiya uske baad ho gaya, use aap karoge toh kyu nahi sir all over India chhodo sir apna UP mein hi apna promotion ho raha hai aapko idea bhi nahi hai promotion ho raha hai aapka India.
Executive: UP pe, UP pe log.
Customer: Nahi maine bataya tha UP mein ek mujhe chahiye.
Executive: Haan wohi mai toh maine all over India ki baat bhi nahi ki, mai khud hi keh raha hu ki UP mein mere ko chahiye toh UP mein aapke jo inquiries hui hai 28, 30, 22, 24, 14 jo bhi inquiries hui hai, theek hai, ye pura hafte ka matlab puri mahine ka bata raha hu, 14 ye 14 kiya hai, August mein 14 ke aas paas inquiries hui hai apne 22 inquiries hui hai, toh inquiries jo aayi hui hai woh woh aisi inquiries hai jo matlab apne matlab samne se log visit kar rahe hai, toh sir kahi na kahi aapki aapka visibility bana hua hai market mein isiliye log visit kar rahe hai, aise thodi hai ki koi aise hi visit kar lega, sir aapko aapko abhi woh dikh nahi raha hai sir ki kya mera usme kya isme promotion hai aur woh cheez hai.
Executive: Promotion hai, theek hai sir, thoda mujhe mere.
Executive: Hello?
Customer: Ji.
Executive: Hello, haan ji mera ji.
Customer: Haan haan bataiye.
Executive: Aslam ji, haan mai keh raha tha ki wohi mai keh raha tha ki sir at least dekho mai ye nahi kahunga aapko ki pura sir pure saal ka le sir aapne, theek hai aap keh rahe ho na mere ko jitna maine dala hai mere ko utna toh return mile, toh sir thoda si thoda toh ek do mahine aur time de sir nahi hoga fir uske baad dekhenge na, mai yaha baitha hua hu aapne aap mere ko WhatsApp pe bhi aapke group banaya tha sir ki jis pe aapko koi bhi dikkat ho aap batao, aap aapka dekho aap se meri video meet pe bhi baat ho chuki hai.
Customer: Hmm hmm, hai na, aap se video meet pe bhi baat ho chuki hai aap samjha bhi chuke hai har tarike se use kar liya hai maine, maine bas is haan ye bata dijiye ki refund wapas ho payega ya nahi ho payega.
Executive: Fir iske baad aage hum koi baat karni nahi hai mujhe, nahi hoga toh koi baat nahi.
Executive: Chaliye theek hai sir mai aapko kisi cheez se kya bolte hai ki kaam bhi nahi aa raha hai aur usme time bhi do, itna hi time kisi aur mein de de woh sahi jyada best rahega, toh mera last question aapse yahi hai ki refund wapas ho payega ya nahi ho payega.
Executive: Sir mai ek kaam karta hu ki senior se ek baar aapki baat kara deta hu woh bhi aapke liye better rahega.
Customer: Ji.
Executive: Mere side se toh ye hai ki refund ka refund ki koi policy nahi hoti, lekin ek baar aapki mai baat kara deta hu.
Executive: Theek hai, koi baat nahi.
Executive: Theek hai, theek hai.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer wants a refund due to no business.

- Customer says he is not getting buyleads.

- Customer says executive is not receiving calls.



Resolution:

- Executive said refund policy is not available.

- Executive offered to connect with a senior.

- Executive explained how to use by-leads.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will connect customer to senior.



Alert (If Any):

refund

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- refund, buyleads, subscription, promotion
